<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">[Healing Plaster](/Spells.aspx?ID=925)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 109 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 5 feet

**Target** a handful of dirt or mud
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You purify some dirt or mud into a pliable, claylike plaster that can aid in clotting and healing. This restorative substance can be used in lieu of [healer's tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=25) for [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) checks to [Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=54) or [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=57). If the plaster isn't used within the spell's duration, or if you Cast the Spell again before using the plaster, it reverts to being normal non-magical earth.

---
**Heightened (3rd)** The plaster grants anyone using it to Administer First Aid or Treat Wounds a +1 item bonus to the Medicine check.
name: Healing Plaster
